name: Trash Tower (Kanashika)
description:
ScoreSpace Game Jam 2021 Premise

Your identical clone has a more prominent tower than you? You must defend your tower's honor! Drag and drop the trash given to you to build your way back to the top!

Rare Bug Note

If after a while you are experiencing issues with loading the high scores, either clear cache or visit https://bookcasemedialab.com/highscores.php?gameid=GAMEJAM2 to see the most updated high scores. Don't worry, your previous score was submitted. Thank you for playing!
